. It is a major trading centre of fish and betel and is known as the birth place of the poet Thunchath Ezhuthachan.

If you are collecting a hire car at Kozhikode airport, it should take less than an hour to drive to Tirur. Take the NH213 to
, then the SH71 to Tirur. If you are driving from Kozhikode city take the main NH17 coast road south for approximately 40 km, then turn right onto the SH71 to Tirur.
